pipeline_name.key_comment: The name of the pipeline must be unique

is_enabled.key_comment: If true the pipeline is enabled.

use_data_objects_spec.key_comment:
If true, load only the objects specified in data_objects_spec which will be configured in the next step.
If false, load all objects from the database_schema (or database_name if no schema exists) in specified in the source_attributes section.

header.key_comment: Specifies whether the file contains a header line with the names of each column in the file.

columns_delimiter.key_comment: The character delimiting individual cells in the CSV data.

quote_char.key_comment: Choose between double-quote, single-quote or none-quote. The default is double-quote.

object_name.key_comment: Specifies a unique data_object name. It can be a table name for database or file/folder name for file export/import.

target_object_name.key_comment: Optional! Specifies target_object_name only if you want it to be different from source_object_name.

recreate_target_object.key_comment: If this parameter is true, the target object (table) will be rebuilt. If false, the object/table will be created if it does not exists.

excluded_columns.key_comment: Specifies a comma-separated list of columns to exclude. Leave empty to include all columns.

load_batch_size.key_comment: Specifies batch size for incremental load. It's not supported yet.

incremental_load_column.key_comment: Incremental load column. It's not supported yet.

file_dir.key_comment: Relevant to file upload only. Specifies path to file directory.

file_name_list.key_comment: Relevant to file upload only. Specifies the filenames to export or leave blank for all files.

target_file_dir.key_comment: Relevant to file extract only. Destination directory after saving data first to output folder.
